member.name: T:CSharpMcp.Server.Tools.Essential.FindReferencesTool
member.summary: find_references 工具 - 查找符号的所有引用
Find all references to a symbol across the workspace

member.name: T:CSharpMcp.Server.Tools.Essential.GetSymbolsTool
member.summary: get_symbols 工具 - 获取文档中的所有符号
Get all symbols in a C# document with optional filtering
member.param: Tool parameters including file path and filters
member.returns: List of symbols found in the document

member.name: T:CSharpMcp.Server.Tools.Essential.GoToDefinitionTool
member.summary: go_to_definition 工具 - 跳转到符号定义
Navigate to the definition of a symbol

member.name: T:CSharpMcp.Server.Tools.Essential.ResolveSymbolTool
member.summary: resolve_symbol 工具 - 获取符号的完整信息
Get comprehensive symbol information including documentation, comments, and context

member.name: T:CSharpMcp.Server.Tools.Essential.SearchSymbolsTool
member.summary: search_symbols 工具 - 搜索跨工作区的符号
Search for symbols across the entire workspace by name pattern

member.name: T:CSharpMcp.Server.Tools.HighValue.GetCallGraphTool
member.summary: get_call_graph 工具 - 获取方法的调用图
Get the call graph for a method showing callers and callees

member.name: T:CSharpMcp.Server.Tools.HighValue.GetInheritanceHierarchyTool
member.summary: get_inheritance_hierarchy 工具 - 获取类型的继承层次结构
Get the complete inheritance hierarchy for a type

member.name: T:CSharpMcp.Server.Tools.HighValue.GetTypeMembersTool
member.summary: get_type_members 工具 - 获取类型的成员
Get all members of a type

member.name: T:CSharpMcp.Server.Tools.Optimization.BatchGetSymbolsTool
member.summary: batch_get_symbols 工具 - 批量获取符号信息 使用并行处理提高性能，减少往返次数
Batch get symbol information for multiple symbols in parallel

member.name: T:CSharpMcp.Server.Tools.Optimization.GetDiagnosticsTool
member.summary: get_diagnostics 工具 - 获取编译诊断信息 返回项目中的错误、警告和信息
Get compiler errors and warnings for a file or workspace

member.name: T:CSharpMcp.Server.Tools.Optimization.GetSymbolCompleteTool
member.summary: get_symbol_complete 工具 - 整合多个信息源获取完整符号信息 减少API调用次数，一次性返回所有需要的信息
Get complete symbol information from multiple sources in one call
